subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: After coming up just short of a gold medal in the 1,500-meter run while representing Kenya in 2004, Bernard Lagat is a favorite to win the event for the United States.
snippet: After coming up just short of a gold medal in the 1,500-meter run while representing Kenya in 2004, Bernard Lagat is a favorite to win the event for the United States.
